question: The jurisdiction covering the Andaman and Nicobar islands falls under the supervision of __:
option1: A circuit bench of the Bombay High Court at Port Blair
option2: A circuit bench of the Madras High Court at Port Blair
option3: A circuit bench of the Calcutta High Court at Port Blair
option4: A circuit bench of Supreme Court of India at Port Blair
answer: A circuit bench of the Calcutta High Court at Port Blair
explanation: The jurisdiction covering the Andaman and Nicobar islands falls under the supervision of circuit bench of the Calcutta High Court at Port Blair.
